column5: Going up for the second time this fall and was wondering wear the best place is to stay. there will four of us in our group and another four in comingup the day after us. we camped at the green grove last year. and were just looking to stay more out of town or just a little closer to the water. there were some cabins on the way down to the twin marina but i cannot remember the name of them any help would be great. thanks to all.. KidWalleye
The cabins you see going into the park are called Mcswanies..or Mcsweenies or... call the reginal park at nipawin they will help you.
Go on www.nipawin.com or .ca and go to the link for accomodations at Tobin. Book ASAP, I just got the last cabin at the resort for 3 days near the end of August. good luck
yea I got ahold of the MacSwaneys cabins as soon as i could. We Got the last two cabins for OCT. 13th-18th Gary
